attributes.action: Bring back a 'Big Four' National Railway regions for England and Wales under public control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bring back a 'Big Four' super railway regions under public control for England and Wales. 

Abolish the franchise system for the passenger railways and replace it with four 'super-regions' under public control for England and Wales.

This would simplify the present privatised railways map with just four contracts under public control.

Less administration, a less confusing railway map and reduced legal costs with just four contracts under greater public accountability and control.
